comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content:
First, please raise issues like this on the user's list first.

Second, there's little chance that any further releases for the 4x code line will ever be made, development on that branch was stopped long ago. If there's a similar problem on the 6x code line, we can re-open this issue.
